features.name: auto 类型推导
features.description: 编译器自动推导变量类型
features.example:
auto x = 42; // int
auto name = std::string("hello");

features.name: nullptr
features.description: 类型安全的空指针常量
features.example: int* ptr = nullptr;

features.name: 范围 for 循环
lambda 表达式
features.example: auto sum = [](int a, int b) { return a + b; };

features.name: 智能指针
features.example: auto ptr = std::make_unique<Widget>();

features.name: 右值引用和移动语义
features.example: std::vector<int> v2 = std::move(v1);

features.name: 统一初始化
features.example:
std::vector<int> vec{1, 2, 3};
Widget w{arg1, arg2};

features.name: constexpr
features.example: constexpr int square(int x) { return x * x; }

features.name: override 和 final
features.example: void draw() override final;

features.name: static_assert
features.example: static_assert(sizeof(int) == 4, "int must be 4 bytes");

features.name: 泛型 lambda
features.example: auto add = [](auto a, auto b) { return a + b; };

features.name: 返回值类型推导
features.description: 函数返回类型使用 auto
features.example: auto add(int a, int b) { return a + b; }

features.name: std::make_unique
features.description: 创建 unique_ptr 的工厂函数
features.example: auto ptr = std::make_unique<Widget>(arg);

features.name: 二进制字面量
features.example: int mask = 0b1010'1010; // 数字分隔符

features.name: 变量模板
features.example:
template<typename T>
constexpr T pi = T(3.1415926535897932385);

features.name: 结构化绑定
features.example:
auto [key, value] = map.insert({1, "one"});
auto [x, y, z] = std::make_tuple(1, 2.0, "3");

features.name: if/switch 初始化语句
features.description: 在条件语句中初始化变量

features.name: constexpr if
features.example: if constexpr (std::is_integral_v<T>) { ... }

features.name: std::optional
features.example:
std::optional<int> find(int key);
if (auto val = find(42)) { use(*val); }

features.name: std::variant
features.example: std::variant<int, double, std::string> v = 42;

features.name: std::string_view
features.example: void process(std::string_view str);

features.name: 折叠表达式
features.example:
template<typename... Args>
auto sum(Args... args) { return (args + ...); }

features.name: 类模板参数推导
features.example: std::pair p{1, 2.0}; // 推导为 pair<int, double>

features.name: Concepts（概念）
features.example:
template<std::integral T>
T add(T a, T b) { return a + b; }

features.name: Ranges（区间）
features.description: 函数式编程风格的容器操作
features.example:
auto result = vec | std::views::filter(pred)
                  | std::views::transform(func);

features.name: Coroutines（协程）
Modules（模块）
features.example:
import std.core;
export module mymodule;

features.name: 三路比较运算符（<=>）
features.example: auto operator<=>(const Point&) const = default;

features.name: 指定初始化器
features.example: Point p{.x = 1, .y = 2};

features.name: consteval 和 constinit
features.example: consteval int square(int n) { return n * n; }

features.name: std::span
features.example: void process(std::span<int> data);

features.name: std::format
features.example: auto s = std::format("Hello, {}!", name);

features.name: std::expected
features.example: std::expected<int, Error> divide(int a, int b);

features.name: std::print
features.example: std::print("Hello, {}!\n", name);

features.name: if consteval
features.example: if consteval { /* 编译期 */ } else { /* 运行期 */ }

features.name: 多维下标运算符
features.example: matrix[i, j] = value; // 代替 matrix[i][j]

features.name: 推导 this
std::mdspan
features.example: std::mdspan<int, std::extents<int, 3, 4>> matrix(data);
